lyrics:
20 contributorsthe thrill lyricsverse 1
can you roll down a window
i just wanna feel the wind blow in my face

prechorus
cause these moments come one blink at a time
thats why i never wanna close my eyes yeah
i can feel the riot in the air tonight
kinda trouble you can taste

chorus
and i cant wait
and i cant wait
its the thrill i feel my heartbeat race
and i cant wait cant wait

verse 2
jamie johnny and jack know
shoot them up shoot them down shshhshooter
dancing up we never black out
never chase never waste never hesitate no

prechorus
cause these moments come one blink at a time
and were just laughing as we lose our mind yeah
we could be a riot in the air tonight
start the kind of trouble you can tell
you might also likechorus
and i cant wait
and i cant wait
its the thrill i feel my heartbeat race
and i cant wait cant wait

bridge
til they play our song
til the lights go on
til we cant drive home
shout give me more give me more
til were all alone
til we greet the sun
give me more give me more yeah
give me more give me more

chorus
and i cant wait
and i cant wait
its the thrill i feel my heartbeat race
and i cant wait cant wait2embed
